function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Combining drugs with vector control may be more effective than either approach alone.","Impact":"Limited effectiveness of individual approaches, increased risk of disease propagation.","Mitigation":"Implement integrated approach that combines both drug treatment and vector control.","Technologies":"Drug treatments, vector control methods.","People":"Communities at risk of infectious diseases.","Owner":"Health organizations, local governments."},{"Description":"Vector control playing a minor role to mass drug administration (MDA) as a supplementary intervention.","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of vector control, potential for increased disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Reevaluate the role of vector control in disease elimination programs, allocate resources for comprehensive vector control strategies.","Technologies":"Advanced vector control methods, data analytics for prioritizing interventions.","People":"Communities at risk of infectious diseases, public health authorities.","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies."},{"Description":"Success of vector control in Onchocerciasis Control Programme (OCP) in Africa.","Impact":"Decrease in onchocerciasis endemicity, reduction in annual transmission potential of infective larvae.","Mitigation":"Continue and expand vector control activities, conduct regular entomological surveys to monitor disease transmission potential.","Technologies":"Aerial larviciding, advanced surveillance and monitoring tools.","People":"Communities at risk of onchocerciasis, public health authorities.","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies."}]}
